reviews.text: Excellent local station serving the North Horsham community. Recently upgraded by Network Rail to lengthen the platform to 8 coach trains and avoiding having to use Horsham Station. The great thing about Littlehaven is that it supports the local community of many thousands of homes, all of which are within walking distance so reduces the reliance on passengers having to drive to the station - when you consider the lack of infrastructure and road planning by our local councils and the knock on congestion this lack of planning has caused, its great North Horsham already has a station that supports its community within walking distance. This is a station that supports the community & is something to be cherished and supported.

No staff on site, just a bunch of abusive teenagers setting fire to things on the platform, smoking and swearing. Trains dissappearing off of the screen and nobody providing updates. Ticket machine also never takes cash.
A lot better since the improvement works were completed. Regular trains towards the coast and towards london, via Gatwick Airport.
Nothing around, ticket machines rarely work with ticket office always closed(even during opening hours)
